Package sep4.iot.gateway.webSocket

Class WebSocketThread

java.lang.Object
sep4.iot.gateway.webSocket.WebSocketThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WebSocketThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Runnable class used to manage the transmission of information between the socket client and the service classes
Since:
26-05-2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daria Popa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WebSocketThread​(java.lang.String url, int user_key)
    Constructor used to start the web socket connection for the user

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearSensorEntries()
    Method for emptying the list of sensor entries
    java.util.ArrayList<SensorEntry> getSensorEntries()
    Method for returning all the saved sensor data
    int getUser_key()
    Getter for the user key
    void run()
    Thread's run method, running indefinitely, until the stop flag is set to true; The method periodically asks the socket for new information and if any, saves it to the list of SensorEntries
    void sendSensorData​(SensorEntry sensorEntry)
    Method for constructing and sending a jsonTelegram to the hardware
    void stop()
    Method for setting the stop flag of the thread to true

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • WebSocketThread

      public WebSocketThread​(java.lang.String url, int user_key)
      Constructor used to start the web socket connection for the user
      Parameters:
      url - - the user's URL created with the unique app token
      user_key - - the user's unique key used to differentiate threads

  • Method Details

    • getUser_key

      public int getUser_key()
      Getter for the user key
      Returns:
      an integer value representing the user_key value

    • getSensorEntries

      public java.util.ArrayList<SensorEntry> getSensorEntries()
      Method for returning all the saved sensor data
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of SensorEntry objects

    • clearSensorEntries

      public void clearSensorEntries()
      Method for emptying the list of sensor entries

    • sendSensorData

      public void sendSensorData​(SensorEntry sensorEntry)
      Method for constructing and sending a jsonTelegram to the hardware
      Parameters:
      sensorEntry - - the object containing the needed information to construct the downlink message

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Method for setting the stop flag of the thread to true

    • run

      public void run()
      Thread's run method, running indefinitely, until the stop flag is set to true; The method periodically asks the socket for new information and if any, saves it to the list of SensorEntries
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
